actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 93-344.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-328.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the House report entitled "Drugs in Our Schools".

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides for the printing of 68,250 additional copies of the House Report entitled "Drugs in Our Schools" of which 55,250 shall be for the use of the House of Representatives and 13,000 copies shall be for the use of the Select Committee on Crime of the House.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the House report entitled "Drugs in Our Schools".
